synopsis.text: Alongside the depths of the internet emerges a peculiar yellow and black creature named Wooser, leading a peculiar hand-to-mouth existence. Despite his lovable appearance, Wooser harbors a dark heart and an insatiable fondness for meat, money, and the company of beautiful girls. This intriguing mascot, with his round eyes and a dot serving as his mouth, is brought to life by Sanzigen's renowned 3D CG animations. Wooser's strange and amusing life is filled with unexpected situations and unconventional adventures, often accompanied by his friends Miho, Ren, and Rin. From DJ dance parties to volunteering at the zoo, Wooser's fascination with panties and schoolgirls adds an eccentric twist to their daily shenanigans. Dive into the world of Wooser's Hand-to-Mouth Life, a series of short films that will leave you both entertained and intrigued.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
